216588:
1⁄2 cup olive oil
2 stalks celery, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
3 leeks leeks, sliced
1 teaspoon dried thyme leaves
1  bay leaf
1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes
2 (8 ounce) bottles clam juice
2 3⁄4 cups dry white wine
2 teaspoons fennel seeds, crushed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
3 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley
1 pound red snapper fillets, cut into 2 inch pieces
1 pinch saffron
24 eaches sea scallops
30 small mussels small mussels, scrubbed and debearded
1 pound cooked lobster meat, cut into bite-size pieces
